trans-unit.source: Represents a class that can read and write key identifiers, key identifier clauses, and security tokens.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en klasse som kan lese og skrive key identifikatorer, nøkkel-ID-setningsdeler og sikkerhetstokener.

trans-unit.source: Use the SecurityTokenSerializer class to read and write <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> classes as XML.
trans-unit.target: Bruk forekomst av SecurityTokenSerializer klassen kan lese og skrive <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>, og <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>klasser som XML.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: The SecurityTokenSerializer class has methods to determine whether this class can read and write these entities and to actually read and write them.
trans-unit.target: Forekomst av SecurityTokenSerializer klassen har metoder for å finne ut om denne klassen kan lese og skrive til disse enhetene og for å lese og skrive dem faktisk.

trans-unit.source: For security tokens, these methods are <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteToken%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Disse metodene er for sikkerhetstokener, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%2A>, og <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteToken%2A>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this serializer can read the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref> element referred to by the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om denne serialiseringen kan lese den <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""> </xref> elementet referert til av den angitte XML-leseren.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som er avledet fra den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>klassen må overstyre den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The CanReadKeyIdentifier method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%2A> method.
An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to read the key identifier.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref> XML element can be read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Når den angitte <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""> </xref> XML-elementet kan være skrivebeskyttet; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
Determines whether this serializer can read a clause in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref> element referred to by the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om denne serialiseringen kan lese en setningsdel i en <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""> </xref> elementet referert til av den angitte XML-leseren.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.

An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to read the key identifier clause.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified key identifier clause can be read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Når setningsdelen angitt nøkkel-ID kan leses; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
